column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I love desserts and patisserie treats. Before this opened
column2: Houston was lacking in the gourmet patisserie division. I've been here a couple of times and ordered a variety of items. I have no complaints to any of the treats I've eaten. The desserts here are great. It's definitely good for Houston's standards. The treats are not overbearingly sweet
column3: they are just right. May be a bit pricey for some
column4: but patisserie treats take a lot of labor.
